answers.answer: Oh yea you can and if it's bad enough you can get a emergency c-section
blood work was all within normal n so far on the monitors my BP hasn't been back up just waiting for urine to come back...ugh I didn't even get to make my final delivery day/next appt!!
I'm sure everything will be fine! That's good that your blood work cane back good! Good luck to you and your little BB. God bless: )

question: So i had my appt this morning n Dr didn't like my first BP check so they checked it again n it didn't go down it went up!! She asked if I've had any headaches I told her yea they started back up in the last two weeks and my BP has been slowly creepin up... Now I gotta get blood work and sent up to triage. I have no idea what they plan on doing but I don't wanna b here all day... I'm 36 weeks today also high risk cuz of my heart problem which is y I was gonna b induced at 39 weeks possibly sooner now I'm guessing... Idk. How early can u b induced because of preeclampia
title: preeclampsia???
